participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Energetic and sociable, enjoys sports and hanging out with friends.
participant_1.background: i ride the bus to school. i hate math class. i am on the soccer team. my brother is older than me.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Frustrated and disillusioned, seeking a change in life and career.
participant_2.background: i'm 40 years old. my wife spends all my money. i hate my job. i'm planning on getting a divorce. i work as a car salesman.

content.text: I am not sure what you do for a living?
